name: Canvas Colors: In The Moving City
name_original: Canvas Colors: In The Moving City
description:
While doing routine deliveries in a moving city, Postman Maggie and her companion Vale seek out a house that was left behind. Who answers the door of that house was the last person either of them expected... 

Canvas Colors is a slice of life story around the Postman Maggie and her traveling companion: A young girl named Vale.

 - Created for the NaNoRenO 2021 game jam. -

Characters:

Vale – A young magician with an interest in flowers. She's quick to shift her attention to whatever shiny new thing interests her.

Maggie – A young woman who works as a postman. Along with delivering mail, her profession also includes maintaining order and upholding the law using her sword. Her pointy ears and her feathery antennae marks her as part of a race called Vanes.

Features:
  • Game Length: ~1 hour
  • Approx. 10k words
  • 2 endings
  • 13 CGs
  • Original backgrounds and artwork
  • Original soundtrack
    • Sound effects used from the public domain
Team:
  • BG/CG/Sprite artist – ffgghhjj
  • "Shrublands" BG artist - CF2
  • Writer - Lambic
  • Programmer - forgetful
  • Music - James J & Fuel
  • Editing - Hoa
